title: Change The Alpha Client Login Screen
body:
Does somebody know how to change the login screen in the alpha client?
Since many of us changed to the alpha client we couldn't change the login screen anymore.
Rito might have changed the folders or completely removed it.
I really want to change my login screen but it doesn't work like on the old client...
If you know the answer many LoL players who wants to change their login screen will be happy :)

sorry for my bad english :^)

I hope you can help.

-Sora{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Modifying game files is unsupported since it can cause issues, and doing so is at your own risk.

With that being said, this is actually a pretty neat idea for a new feature! Feel free to post this over in the Client Discussion Board to see what others think of your idea. This is a really good time to do so, since the new client is still in testing ^_^!
Bump and a half 50 times over
